snippet.title: Rakoo's Adventure - Mobile / Tablet - Happy Valentine's Day! (English Trailer)
snippet.description:
RAKOO meets RAKOONETTE on Valentine's day!
Rakoo's Adventure celebrates Valentine's Day with the Valentine's update! Tons of new features are now available, while the game is now free to play on smartphones and tablets!  
A whole new world, huge and immersive, has been created especially for the occasion, with new enemies, puzzles, hats to customize your characters and pets. A total of 64 colourful levels are also available, while the Pet feature is now more simple and pets more powerful!! Last but not least, Rakoo is finally going to meet Rakoonette!!! 

Rakoo's Adventures is available on smartphones and Tablets.
For more information, please visit the official website  your local Namco Bandai Games website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
